cause.description:
Marijuana, cannabis, weed, pot, ganja, whatever you call, it is often deemed as an evil drug and put in the same classifications as cocaine, heroin and other illicit drugs. The U.S. govt. spends millions of YOUR tax dollars every year on criminalizing medicinal and non medicinal marijuana users.
1. Legalize Marijuana
2. Stop arresting medicinal users
3. Hemp is a valuable resource that is being ignored
cause.mission: To help people realize the lie we've been told about this gift.
cause.name: Legalize Marijuana
